attributes.action: To Create a Bank Holiday In England for St.Georges day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Enland needs a Fixed point in the year to allow English People to show their culture, history and nationhood.
Please support Englands right to show pride in our Nation.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
